rooms.name: Deluxe Single Room
rooms.description: Free toiletries Shower Safe Streaming service (like Netflix) Toilet Towels Linens Socket near the bed Hypoallergenic Tile/Marble floor Desk Private entrance TV Slippers Tea/Coffee maker Iron Radio Heating Hairdryer Extra long beds (> 6.5 ft) Wake-up service/Alarm clock Carpeted Electric kettle Wake-up service Wardrobe or closet Wireless internet Upper floors accessible by stairs only Clothes rack Toilet paper Single-room AC for guest accommodation
